titleStmt.title: A just plea against swearing, and against the national worship of England briefly demonstrating the grounds and reasons why we choose rather to suffer, then to bow to either of them. By a sufferer for his testimony against them, known by the name of Ja. Picton.
titleStmt.author: Picton, James.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
